cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the security of blockchain technology, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also focuses on the impact of network connectivity on the consensus security of blockchain, which involves distributed computing (cs.DC) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The paper proposes an analytical model to assess the impact, which involves mathematical modeling and analysis (cs.DS) and simulation (cs.SI). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CR, followed by cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, and cs.SI.
